before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2h1sr","text":"A basic understanding on gromacs and simulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"j6lt","text":"For visual assistance refer to https://youtu.be/QMR4f4eRSbs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":28}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FC127CECC70811ED840C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://youtu.be/QMR4f4eRSbs"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"q10g","text":"This paper presents a protocol for the development of coarse-grained  (CG) structures for macromolecular simulation using the GROMACS  software. CG models are widely used in molecular simulations due to  their computational efficiency, which allows for the study of large and  complex systems. The protocol described here outlines the steps  necessary for the creation of CG structures, including the selection of  appropriate beads, mapping of the CG beads onto the atomistic structure,  and the parameterization of the CG model. The protocol also includes  guidelines for validating the accuracy of the CG model, as well as  recommendations for future improvements in CG model development. The  described protocol will be useful for researchers interested in the  development of CG models for macromolecular simulations using GROMACS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dojb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ptk8","text":"The last step contains a supplemental video with extra context and tips, as part of the protocols.io Spotlight series, featuring conversations with protocol authors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":9}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0FB7C54168C242468ACE49E5F44BA2E7","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/protocol-for-the-development-of-coarse-grained-str-c5xuy7nw?step=16"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"660dt","text":"DOWNLOAD THE PDB FILE FROM https://www.rcsb.org/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":21}],"data":{}},{"key":"1q566","text":"Here, in this tutorial DUSP28 https://www.rcsb.org/structure/5Y15 is used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":35}],"data":{}},{"key":"2qrrd","text":"Preprocess the pdb to remove all ions and B chain or can obtained from here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YDJV2hKtZ5dJrl8S6A_4AFdTt_lVJFMv/view?usp=sharing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":76,"length":82}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"42B2C159C2F411ED93310A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.rcsb.org"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"42B2C1C9C2F411ED93310A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.rcsb.org/structure/5Y15"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"42B2C236C2F411ED93310A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YDJV2hKtZ5dJrl8S6A_4AFdTt_lVJFMv/view?usp=sharing"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ev3ls","text":"Setup Periodic box\ngmx editconf -f 1UBQ-CG.pdb -o 1UBQ-CG.gro -d 1.0 -c -bt dodecahedron","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":69}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3m1se","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ncgi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"57012157345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":158,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"f744k\",\"text\":\"Output after addition of Box\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"STEP_5.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k26rb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k26pb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k26qb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k26nb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c50vd","text":"To minimise the coarse_grained structure in vaccum\ngmx grompp -f em_vac.mdp -c 1UBQ-CG.gro -p single-ubq.top -o em_vac.tpr\n ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":73}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eprnf","text":"Solvate the protein\ngmx solvate -cp em_vac.gro -cs water.gro -radius 0.21 -o solvated.gro","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":69}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lbhs","text":"Add ions (optional to neutralise or addition ions)
gmx grompp -f ions.mdp -c solvated.gro -p system.top -o ions.tpr
gmx genion -s ions.tpr -o ions.gro -p protein.top -pname NA+ -nname CL- -conc 0.1 -neutral
 we have not added here but in the video its shown how to add.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":155}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"235np","text":"Energy minimisation
 gmx grompp -f em.mdp -c solvated.gro -r solvated.gro -p system.top -o em.tpr -maxwarn 1
maxwarn is because there is an mismatch of atom names but all the atoms are present
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":87}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d30i5","text":"NVT equilibration\ngmx grompp -f nvt.mdp -c em.gro -r em.gro -p system.top -o nvt.tpr\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":67}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tt1o","text":"NPT equilibration\ngmx grompp -f npt.mdp -c nvt.gro -r nvt.gro  -p system.top -o npt.tpr\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13a72","text":"MD run\ngmx grompp -f md.mdp -c npt.gro -p system.top -o md.tpr\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":56}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cuh7g","text":"Analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ag7d","text":"Before analysis conect command should be used to show bonds in visualisation software and also pbc should be removed
echo 1 1 | gmx trjconv -f md.gro -s md.tpr -o recentered_traj.gro -pbc mol -center
echo 1 | gmx trjconv -f recentered_traj.gro -s md.tpr -conect -o connected_traj.pdb
echo 1 1 | gmx trjconv -f md.xtc -s md.tpr -o recentered_traj.xtc -pbc mol -center
sed -i ‘/ENDMDL/d’ connected_traj.pdb","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":117,"length":287}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6abv0","text":"to visualize","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1ehd","text":"vmd recentered_traj.xtc connected_traj.pdb","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g66c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjsru","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9s6em","text":"Video shows protein over 20ns ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"570B4C67345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":0,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"idk.mpeg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ktsnb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ktsmb4fnp.mp4","width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekqqs","text":"Step 2- 12 can be automated using a shell script","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80fvf","text":"sh commands.sh","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8aet0","text":"To add number of water molecules into toplogy file for polarised water divide count by 3
 cp single-ubq.top system.top
 count=$(grep -c “W” solvated.gro | tr -d ‘\n’)
 echo -e “\nW    $count” >> system.top","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":116}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u13b","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5712958E345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":173,"is_video":false,"legend":"{"blocks":[{"key":"bfqml","text":"Addition of water molecules and making system topology files","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"STEP_7.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k265b4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k263b4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k264b4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k262b4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34c90","text":"gmx mdrun -deffnm md -v","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qk9k","text":"`   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"as0vs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5717A11E345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":241,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"79dti\",\"text\":\"Production run for 200 ns\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"STEP_12.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27mb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27jb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k27kb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27ib4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g7l3","text":"Calculation RMSD and radius of Gyration and plotting using XMGRACE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb5k7","text":"echo 1 1 | gmx rms -s md.tpr -f recentered_traj.xtc -o rmsd.xvg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70f5i","text":"xmgrace rmsd.xvg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17hoh","text":"echo 1 | gmx gyrate -s md.tpr -f recentered_traj.xtc -o gyrate.xvg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vtn3","text":"xmgrace gyrate.xvg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d9gu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8tkk5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"571919A2345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":374,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"rcde\",\"text\":\"RMSD plot Distance nm vs Time ps\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"STEP_13.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27rb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27pb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k27qb4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27nb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fik22","text":"to change name of martini itp file in toplogy, for what you have selected in above step","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"634q","text":"sed -i -e ‘s/martini.itp/martini_v2.2.itp/’ single-ubq.top","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":58}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jpk2","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5k9p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A40F3129345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":101,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"68qan\",\"text\":\"Snap of topology file after above command\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"STEP_4out.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27vb4fnp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27tb4fnp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k27ub4fnp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k27sb4fnp.webp","width":550}}}}
